item.title: Install newer version of Ruby on OS X Yosemite
item.description: This post describes how to install a newer version of Ruby on OS X Yosemite. Following this video: https://youtu.be/jx0NrIbQbzI $ brew update First install rbenv: $ brew install rbenv $ brew info rbenv $ emacs .bashrc Execute (and add to .bashrc): export RBENV_ROOT=/usr/local/var/rbenv if which rbenv > /dev/null; then eval "$(rbenv init -)"; fi Now we have rbenv installed. See if it works: $ rbenv We need to install the ruby-build plugin.
